references.paper_title: Efficiency of coordinate descent methods on huge-scale optimization problems
references.reason: This paper introduces the concept of coordinate descent methods and their efficiency for large-scale optimization problems, which is foundational to the current work's approach.

references.paper_title: Randomized gradient-free methods in convex optimization
references.reason: This paper presents a state-of-the-art algorithm for zero-order optimization using an order oracle, which is directly relevant to the current research.
This paper introduces another state-of-the-art algorithm for zero-order optimization using an order oracle, improving the convergence rates compared to previous work.

references.paper_title: Even faster accelerated coordinate descent using non-uniform sampling
references.reason: This paper presents an accelerated coordinate descent method, which is foundational to the current research in developing accelerated algorithms.

references.paper_title: Efficiency of the accelerated coordinate descent method on structured optimization problems
references.reason: This paper provides another accelerated coordinate descent method with improved convergence rates, crucial for the development of accelerated algorithms in the current work.
